remarks: A half-open interval starting at ` A ` is open in the closed interval from ` A ` to ` B ` .  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.)
statement:
icoopnst.1 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` ( ( abs o. - ) |` ( ( A [,] B ) X. ( A [,] B ) ) ) ) $.
icoopnst $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( C e. ( A (,] B ) -> ( A [,) C ) e. J ) ) $.
